Package lighting

Class PointLight

java.lang.Object
lighting.PointLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
Spotlight
public class PointLight extends Object implements LightSource
Point light is a type of light source that is from a certain point

    • findPointsAroundLight

      public LinkedList<Point> findPointsAroundLight(Vector lightDirection, int root_of_points)
      this function inside PointLight returns a list of points around the origin this function uses createListOfMovedPoints in order to achieve the goal
      Specified by:
      findPointsAroundLight in interface LightSource
      Parameters:
      lightDirection - vector from the object to the light source
      root_of_points - this number is used to calculate how many points to create
      Returns:
      the list of points
